sentences.en: A scalpel and tweezers are the only tools needed.
sentences.cn: 只需备有解剖刀和镊子.

sentences.en: Auto shift to tweezers or soldering iron function.
sentences.cn: 自动切换电热镊子及烙铁双功能.

sentences.en: Bee stings should be removed with tweezers.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂的螫刺应该用小镊子拔出来.

sentences.en: Conclusion An optical tweezers can easily trap and manipulate biological micro - objects.
sentences.cn: 结论激光束陷阱能够方便地捕获和操纵生物微粒.

sentences.en: New dual function tweezers and soldering pen combination.
sentences.cn: 全新电热镊子及烙铁双功能.

sentences.en: Normal tweezers would work just fine too.
sentences.cn: 用普通的小钳子也可以.

sentences.en: Objective To manipulate biological micro - objects by using an optical tweezers.
sentences.cn: 目的利用光镊实现对生物微粒的操纵.

sentences.en: Option 936 or 868 control unit to form tweezers soldering station.
sentences.cn: 选购936或868的控制主机,自由组合镊子焊台.

sentences.en: Remove the bee sting with tweezers.
sentences.cn: 用镊子拔掉蜜蜂的螫刺。

sentences.en: She plucked it out with a pair of tweezers.
sentences.cn: 她用镊子把它拔了出来.

sentences.en: She was plucking her eyebrows with a pair of tweezers .
sentences.cn: 她正拿着一把小镊子在拔眉毛。

sentences.en: The 23 year - old the works using just paper, scissors and tweezers.
sentences.cn: 美林今年23岁,她只用纸张 、 剪刀和镊子,就能做出金梅的手工.

sentences.en: The invention transcends the run - of - the - mill optical tweezers.
sentences.cn: 这项发明的效能远远超越了一般的光钳.

sentences.en: Use tweezers to pluck your eyebrows.
We simply removed from the cracked endocarp with sterile tweezers.
sentences.cn: 我们简单地用消过毒的镊子从裂开的内果皮中取出种子.

phrases.tran_cn: 光镊子，光学镊子；光钳；雷射光钳（optical tweezer的复数）

trans.tran_en: a small tool that has two narrow pieces of metal joined at one end, used to pull or move very small objects
